title: 2025 Saudi Arabian GP FP2 results - Norris fastest as Tsunoda crashes
summary: Norris led a McLaren 1-2 in second practice at Jeddah as Red Bull's Tsunoda crashed against the wall

qa_pairs.question: Which driver recorded the fastest time in the second practice session of the 2025 Saudi Arabian Grand Prix?
What was the team performance outcome for McLaren during the second practice session in Jeddah?
Which team was Yuki Tsunoda representing when he crashed during the practice session?
